reviews.text: Excellent hotel, well placed within Flam and very well equipped. Very good restaurant for dinner and breakfast. Excellent room within the old hotel. Ample parking. Family friendly, plenty to do in Flam.
reviews.title: Quality at a sensible price - can't wait to return!

reviews.text: We stayed here for one night as part of a Globus tour in June 2009.
reviews.title: Flam Fretheim Hotel - great scenery!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location of this hotel is beautiful, surrounded by mountains. There isn’t much here, but scenery, so if you are looking for a hip city with lots of restaurants and things going on, Flam is not for you. But, if you are looking for amazing scenery, then you will love Flam. This appeared to be the only hotel in Flam.
reviews.title: Don't pay extra for fjord view or balcony.
Flam Rip off and rudeness!
reviews.text: The dock, train station, and shopping are literally a 1-2 minute walk from the hotel. We cruised the Sognefjord from Flam and then our tour bus picked us up somewhere else and drove us back, so that we could catch the Flam railway up and down the mountain. I would highly recommend both of these!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had dinner and breakfast at the hotel compliments of our tour. Dinner and breakfast were both small buffets. There were more cold than hot choices at both.
reviews.title: Very, very disappointing
A+++ experience
reviews.text: The hotel Freitheim was a wonderful experience. Amenities, service, friendliness... all were exceptional. From the owner on down, everyone was friendly and helpful. Thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Received excellent, personable service from the waiters at the restaurant along with great tips on what to do while in Flam... including the FjordSafari tours.
the hotel just beside the train station, but dont worry it doesnt make any noise at all.
reviews.title: Nice place
Absolutely worth it!
reviews.text: I love the scenary, the hotel also close to the cruise, so all you need is just walk. I love the apple tree's, where we can pick the apple tree's there and enjoy the fresh apple.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: and yeah of course, the staffs were too arrogant, no smile at all. esp when we're having our own chilly sauce, they really angry and scolding my mom not to bring any outside food. a small pack of chilly sauce that you usually get when you're buying a KFC.
reviews.title: A positive stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: the funny thing is, we're in the buffet restaurant, not a dine in restaurant.
reviews.title: Don't bother

reviews.text: Great Hotel.

reviews.text: 2 mins from Station or Ferry

reviews.title: Delightful staff in an unforgettable location
